    Fields in abstraction declared as Player

    static Player Game.player1

    static Player Game.player2

    static Player Game.winner

    Methods in abstraction that return Player
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Player Board.checkVictory()
    If there is one of the win condition, returns the player who wins
    Player Bushi.getOwner()
    Returns the Player who owns the Bushi
    Player Game.playRound()
    Plays a round of the game
    Methods in abstraction with parameters of type Player
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Game.changeCurrentPlayer​(Player newCurrentPlayer)
    Changes the current player to the newCurrentPlayer (his opponent)
    boolean Board.checkIfPlayerOwnsBushiSelected​(Player player)
    Returns a boolean indicating if the bushi selected is owned by the player in parameter
    Constructors in abstraction with parameters of type Player
    Constructor Description
